sentence.Network_en: I could have you arrested forthwith!
The agreement between us is terminated forthwith.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们之间的协议立即终止。

sentence.Network_en: These violations of the code must cease forthwith.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些违犯法规的行为必须立即停止.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... forth 向前 forthwith 立刻 fortify 加强.
译网情深 - 打印文章 - ... foreign invested enterprise 外资企业 forthwith 立即 franked dividends 税务减免股息.
顿字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 顿然〖 suddenly〗 顿时〖 immediately;atonce;forthwith〗 顿首〖 kowtow〗.

list.abs: ...不经辩论作出决定 To decide without any debate立刻决定 To decide forthwith取消决定 To rescind a decision
Tell him to come forthwith ., 叫他立刻来.
I said good night and left forthwith ., 我道了晚安后马上走了.
the secretariat shall forthwith notify the party concerned of the decision ., 秘书处应立即将决定通知有关缔约方.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (in the sense 'along with, at the same time'): partly from earlier forthwithal, partly representing forth with used alone without a following noun

example.ex: I could have you arrested forthwith!

means.word_mean: 1. without delay or hesitation; with no time intervening;

sentences.sentence: "an official accused of dishonesty should be suspended forthwith"

auth_sentence.content: He embarked forthwith on an eulogy of his late playmate.
auth_sentence.res_content: He embarked forthwith on an eulogy of his late playmate.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He embarked forthwith on an eulogy of his late playmate.

auth_sentence.content: Advise Forthwith how thou oughtst to receive him.
auth_sentence.res_content: Advise Forthwith how thou oughtst to receive him.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Advise Forthwith how thou oughtst to receive him.

auth_sentence.content: It is more than needful Forthwith that Edward be pronounc'd a traitor.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is more than needful Forthwith that Edward be pronounc'd a traitor.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is more than needful Forthwith that Edward be pronounc'd a traitor.

sentences.en: The above are to report to me forthwith.
sentences.cn: 上述人员必须立即向我报告。

sentences.en: These violations of the code must cease forthwith.
sentences.cn: 这些违犯法规的行为必须立即停止。
